data.name: Castle in the Sky - Clash of Sky Palace - 2 Players Combat Versus Fighting game
data.detailed_description:
This is the DLC Game for Castle in the Sky Visual Novel ARPG, it is an Independent Action Fight Game that can be played by two players.
This DLC Action Combat Versus game can be played without buying the Main Game
Online Player Mode required both players download the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
